name: Late Blight of Potato
symptoms: Dark brown lesions on leaves and stems, white fungal growth under moist conditions.
management: Use resistant varieties, fungicide sprays, crop rotation.

name: Rice Blast
symptoms: Spindle-shaped lesions with gray centers and brown margins on rice leaves.
management: Apply nitrogen judiciously, fungicide sprays, use resistant varieties.

name: Maize Stem Borer
symptoms: Bore holes in stems, dead hearts, reduced plant vigor.
management: Collect and destroy infected stalks, use biocontrol (Trichogramma), insecticides if severe.
